C

CachedScanner - Class in ExternalSorting
This is essentially a wrapper on java.util.Scanner to keep the last word in memory.
CachedScanner(Scanner) - Constructor for class ExternalSorting.CachedScanner
 
close() - Method in class ExternalSorting.CachedScanner
 
createSortedTempFiles(long, int, long, Scanner, Comparator<String>, File) - Static method in class ExternalSorting.FileSorter
This method essentially takes a large file and scans a set block into memory This block is then sorted and saved to a temp file.

E

ExternalSorting - package ExternalSorting
 

F

FileSorter - Class in ExternalSorting
Sorts a large input file by splitting it into sorted temp files and merging them into a sorted output file.
FileSorter(Properties) - Constructor for class ExternalSorting.FileSorter
Constructor for initializing an instance with custom properties.

G

getEstimatedBlockSize(long, int, long) - Static method in class ExternalSorting.FileSorter
This method estimates a block size which is how much data we can read into memory at a chunk It also ensures that this block size is not more than the free memory and not excessively less than free memory such that it becomes inefficient
getEstimatedFreeMemory() - Static method in class ExternalSorting.FileSorter
This method essentially attempts to estimate the available free memory.
getEstimatedStringSize(String) - Static method in class ExternalSorting.FileSorter
This method essentially estimates a string size in bytes It estimates 2 bytes per character plus an object overheard based on the JVM bit size

I

isEmpty() - Method in class ExternalSorting.CachedScanner
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class ExternalSorting.FileSorter
 
mergeSortedTempFiles(Comparator<String>, List<File>, BufferedWriter, int) - Static method in class ExternalSorting.FileSorter
This uses a min/max heap and the merge k sorted lists algorithm to merge the sorted temp files.

P

peek() - Method in class ExternalSorting.CachedScanner
 
pop() - Method in class ExternalSorting.CachedScanner
 

S

sortAndSaveTempFile(List<String>, Comparator<String>, File) - Static method in class ExternalSorting.FileSorter
This method sorts a chunk of words that are within the block size limit and saves the sorted chunk to a temp file to clear up memory for the next chunk.
